content:
Convenient laundry options are a must when traveling! There are a few laundry services and laundromats near the Fairmont in San Francisco that you can use:

1. Fairmont Hotel Laundry Service: The Fairmont hotel itself offers a laundry and dry cleaning service. You can drop off your laundry at the concierge desk, and they'll take care of it for you. This service is available for a fee, and they can usually have your laundry ready within 24 hours.
2. Laundry Care Center: This laundromat is about a 10-minute walk from the Fairmont. They offer wash-and-fold services, dry cleaning, and even alterations. They're open Monday to Saturday from 9am to 7pm and Sunday from 10am to 6pm.
3. Sparklean Laundry: This laundromat is about a 12-minute walk from the Fairmont. They offer self-service laundry, wash-and-fold services, and dry cleaning. They're open Monday to Friday from 8am to 8pm, Saturday from 9am to 7pm, and Sunday from 10am to 6pm.
4. Spin Cycle Laundry: This laundromat is about a 15-minute walk from the Fairmont. They offer self-service laundry, wash-and-fold services, and dry cleaning. They're open Monday to Friday from 8am to 8pm, Saturday from 9am to 7pm, and Sunday from 10am to 6pm.
5. Drop-off Laundry Services: There are also several drop-off laundry services in the area that will pick up your laundry from the hotel and return it to you clean and folded. Some popular options include LaundryCare, Sudshare, and Rinse.

Please note that hours and availability may be subject to change, so it's always a good idea to call ahead or check their websites to confirm.

Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with!
